mapper.insert: insert into employee (id, username, password, name, phone, sex, id_number, status, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) values (#{id}, #{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{sex}, #{idNumber}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser})
mapper.update:

username = #{username},

mapper.select:
select id, username, name, phone, sex, id_number as idNumber, status, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, create_user as createUser, update_user as updateUser from employee
and name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and username != 'admin'
order by update_time desc
